text:
@WhiteHouse Without adequate testing and clinical trials no one in their right mind would take a covid19 vaccine. 
Fast tracking a vaccine is a disaster waiting to happen .... just like the HPV vaccine that was fast tracked. Now those women are paying the price. #CovidVaccine
